messages.title: Pompey Matters
messages.content: In this first issue of Pompey Matters, Stephen Morgan shares with us why he’s hoping to be our next MP for Portsmouth South.

messages.title: Fact Checker
messages.content: Labour can win here! Despite what other parties may say, Labour is the only party in the south of the city which has been effective in growing local support in recent years.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in city centre regeneration and attract better paying jobs and more businesses.
Ensure more homes are built, particularly affordable housing for local people.
Rebuild the National Health Service with better funding and resources.
Secure the industry and protect jobs in the dockyard.
Reduce funding cuts to protect Portsmouth's schools from crippling budget cuts.

issues.education: reduce funding cuts to protect Portsmouth's schools from crippling budget cuts.
issues.health: Rebuild the National Health Service with better funding and resources.
issues.labourEmployment: Invest in better paying jobs and protect local jobs in the dockyard.
issues.lawCrime: Tackling crime in the city, more police on the streets.

community.content: Ensure more homes are built, particularly affordable housing for local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born and bred in this great city of ours, I’m hugely proud of what we can achieve as a city.

contactInformation.address: Portsmouth Labour, 10 Old London Road, Portsmouth, PO2 9FS

images.caption: Stephen Morgan on a visit to QA.

examples: Labour is the only party in the south of the city which has been effective in growing local support in recent years.
Invest in better paying jobs and more businesses.
Born and bred in this great city of ours, I’m hugely proud of what we can achieve as a city.
The city where my family, friends and residents of this city encouraged me to throw my hat in the ring for next month’s general election.
I’m hugely proud to serve as a councillor and volunteer to help make our city a better place.
Invest in better paying jobs and protect local jobs in the dockyard.
port city's schools from crippling budget cuts.
more homes local people can afford.
Don't be fooled by Lib Dem.
Don't be fooled by Lib Dem.

examples: Born and bred in this great city of ours.
